work.name: The AnyLogic Company
work.summary: Hired as the QA Team leader to bring AnyLogic products quality to the next level I am solely responsible for the testing processes, planning, and team prosperity. I feel great pride in my job and together with my leadership tasks I engage in daily performing manual testing routines.
highlights: Redefined company QA processes achieving a business goal of focusing on product stability and comprehensive quality control. Improved project workflows and Jira ticket culture.
Significantly reduced the number of issues escalated thru customer support.
Conducted over 30 job interviews resulted in hiring of eminent QA engineers.
Mentored junior QA engineers, held regular one-to-one check-ins, provided support and guidance helping the team to thrive. Improved onboarding process and documentation.
Developed a set of automated API tests in Python.
Coordinate new releases testing: issue triaging, optimal resource utilization.
Work in close collaboration with development teams, participated in new feature design.
Perform manual feature and bugfix testing, conducted regression testing.
Constant testing documentation perfection.

work.name: ALM Works
work.summary: ALM Works creates complex plug-ins for JIRA used by tens of thousands software developers across the globe. Here I brought my testing skills to enterprise level, forging my vision of what quality is and how it should be maintained. I gained deep experience in JIRA product, software developing workflows, and SCRUM principles.
highlights: Manual functional, regression and exploratory testing of web applications (add-ons for Jira).
Performed analysis and test design for functionalities under test.
Worked with bugs: localization, creating bug reports, verification of fixes.
Created and maintained test documentation: checklists, mind maps, knowledge base.
Worked in a SCRUM team.

work.name: The AnyLogic Company
work.summary: I joined AnyLogic company as a simulation model developer promptly focusing on finding bugs in a newly created modeling library. Attention to detail and aptitude with complex systems proved me being a natural at QA even further taking part in delivering many successful releases.
highlights: Manually tested new functionality, preformed regression testing.
Web application and desktop simulation modelling IDE testing.
Created checklists and test plans.
Communicated with the development team.
Participated in making lists of tasks for the next release.
Introduced and maintained the testing process in the project, was solely responsible for all test activities.
Initiated regular review of tasks lists for large releases introducing necessary changes in planned tasks and significantly reducing the number of releases postponed due to unmet goals.

education.area: Statistical Modelling, Applied Mathematics and Informatics
